text: Anata gata wa, jinrui ni nokosa reta sairyō no kyōdōtaidearu. Anata gata wa tadashī koto o meiji, jaakuna koto o kinji, arrā o shinpō suru. Keiten'notami mo shinkō surunaraba, kare-ra no tame ni don'nani yokatta ka. Daga kare-ra no aru mono wa shinkō suruga, daibubun no mono wa arrā no okite ni somuku mono-tachidearu
